ResearchProjectDef.label: Conveyor Belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of the basic elements of the A2B conveyor belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Conveyor: Climatization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Climatized components allow your A2B system to continue functioning at even lower temperatures than before!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Conveyor: Component Durability
ResearchProjectDef.description: Stronger building materials result in more durable belts what wear down much slower than before!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Conveyor: Component Reliability
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enhanced production processes yield more reliable components that never jam under normal conditions!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Conveyor: Faster Belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: By upgrading the motors which drive the belts, components can deliver goods at a much faster speed.
